title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 404.3 - Precedence of cleanup and removal claims
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 404.3 - Precedence of cleanup and removal claims

State Regulations

Payment of the full cost of cleanup and removal shall take
precedence over the payment of damage claims relating to a specific
discharge. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 2
ยง
404.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
